languages.text: "Нет, нет, не те конструкты, что плавят в котлах и отправляют в глубины мануфакторума! Это какое-то подобие когитатора — кошмарная пародия на священную машину, что вместо благости Омниссии питается нечестивым духом и жизненной силой несчастных, запертых на нижних уровнях!"

traits.locale_text: "Нет, нет... не те конструкты, что плавят в котлах мануфакторума! Это какое-то подобие когитатора... кошмарная пародия на священную машину, что вместо благости Омниссии питается нечестивым духом и жизненной силой несчастных, запертых на нижних уровнях!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"
languages.original_text: "Нет, нет, не те конструкты, что плавят в котлах и отправляют в глубины мануфакторума! Это какое-то подобие когитатора — кошмарная пародия на священную машину, что вместо благости Омниссии питается нечестивым духом и жизненной силой несчастных, запертых на нижних уровнях!"

traits.locale_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “不，不，我指的并不是那些在熔炉中熔化，之后送到制造工厂深处的造物！不是，它是某种类似于沉思者的东西，神圣机器恐怖的翻版。那台沉思者并非由欧姆尼塞亚的恩典驱动，而是由被囚禁在下层的那些可怜人被腐化的精神与生命力所驱动！”
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: “不，不，我指的并不是那些在熔炉中熔化，之后送到制造工厂深处的造物！不是，它是某种类似于思考器的东西，神圣机器恐怖的翻版。那台思考器并非由欧姆尼塞亚的恩典驱动，而是由被囚禁在下层的那些可怜人被腐化的精神与生命力所驱动！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «No, no, ¡no es como esos constructos que se funden en hornos y se envían a las profundidades del manufactorum! Es algo similar a un cogitador; ¡una parodia atroz de una máquina sagrada, alimentada no por la gracia del Omnissiah, sino por el espíritu profano y la fuerza vital de los desdichados encerrados en los niveles inferiores!».
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: «No, no, ¡no es como esos constructos que se funden en hornos y se envían a las profundidades del manufactorum! Es algo similar a un cogitador; ¡una parodia atroz de una máquina sagrada, alimentada no por la gracia del Omnissiah, sino por el espíritu profano y la fuerza vital de los desdichados encerrados en los niveles inferiores!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「いいえ、いいえ、それらは炉で溶かされて聖工場の深みに送り込まれるような構造物ではありません！それは一種の考算機のようなもので…神聖な機械の悪夢のような変異種です。万機神の恩寵ではなく、下層に幽閉された不幸な人々の不浄の精神と生命力によって動いているものなのです！」
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、いいえ、それらは炉で溶かされて聖工場の深みに送り込まれるような構造物ではありません！それは一種の考算機のようなもので…神聖な機械の悪夢のような変異種です。万機神の恩寵ではなく、下層に幽閉された不幸な人々の不浄の精神と生命力によって動いているものなのです！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Nein, nein, nicht die Konstrukte, die eingeschmolzen und in die Tiefen des Manufactorums geschickt werden! Es ähnelt eher einem Cogitator – eine albtraumhafte Parodie einer heiligen Maschine, nicht angetrieben von der Gnade des Omnissiah, sondern von dem unheiligen Geist und der Lebensenergie der unglücklichen Seelen, die auf den unteren Ebenen eingesperrt sind!"
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein, nein, nicht die Konstrukte, die eingeschmolzen und in die Tiefen des Manufactorums geschickt werden! Es ähnelt eher einem Cogitator – eine albtraumhafte Parodie einer heiligen Maschine, nicht angetrieben von der Gnade des Omnissiah, sondern von dem unheiligen Geist und der Lebensenergie der unglücklichen Seelen, die auf den unteren Ebenen eingesperrt sind!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Non, non, je ne parle pas de ces machines qui sont fondues dans les fourneaux et envoyées dans les profondeurs du manufactorum. Ce monstre s'apparente à un cogitateur. C'est une parodie cauchemardesque d'une machine sacrée qui est alimentée non par la grâce de l'Omnimessie, mais par l'esprit et la force vitale impies des malheureux emprisonnés dans les niveaux inférieurs ! »
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: « Non, non, je ne parle pas de ces machines qui sont fondues dans les fourneaux et envoyées dans les profondeurs du manufactorum. Ce monstre s'apparente à un cogitateur. C'est une parodie cauchemardesque d'une machine sacrée qui est alimentée non par la grâce de l'Omnimessie, mais par l'esprit et la force vitale impies des malheureux emprisonnés dans les niveaux inférieurs ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Hayır, hayır. Fırınlarda eritilip manufaktorumun derinliklerine gönderilen yapılardan bahsetmiyorum! Bir nevi kavramsayar, kutsal makinenin fena bir taklidi. Gücünü Hermesih'in lütfundan değil, alt seviyelerde tutsak tutulan zavallıların meşum ruhundan ve yaşam gücünden alıyor!"
languages.original_text: "No, no, not those constructs that are melted down in furnaces and sent into the depths of the manufactorum! It is some kind of semblance of a cogitator — a nightmarish parody of a sacred machine, powered not by the Omnissiah's grace, but by the unholy spirit and life force of the unfortunates imprisoned on the lower levels!"

traits.locale_text: “Hayır, hayır, fırınlarda eritilip manufaktorumun derinliklerine gönderilen yapılardan bahsetmiyorum! Bir nevi kavramsayar, kutsal makinenin fena bir taklidi. Gücünü Hermesih'in lütfundan değil, alt seviyelerde tutsak tutulan zavallıların meşum ruh ve yaşam gücünden alıyor!”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
